question: Analyze the current technology adoption trends across different industries based on company data.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies and their associated industries from the CompanyInfo table, filtering out inactive companies.
Gather data on the technologies listed for each company by joining CompanyInfo with CompanyTechStack to see what technologies are being adopted in each industry.
Analyze the emerging IT trends and technologies relevant to each industry by referring to the IndustryITTrend table, and correlate it with the technologies adopted by the companies.
Summarize the findings to determine which technologies are most frequently adopted in each industry and create a report of trends observed in the data.
